SEARCH
Modul model
Package de.kaiser.model.structure

Schnittstelle Element

Alle bekannten Unterschnittstellen:
InlineElement
Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
AbstractElement, AbstractInlineElement, BlockImage, Footnote, Headline, Hyperlink, LayoutTable, ListItem, PageNumber, Paragraph, Part, Section, SimpleList, Table, TextBlock, TextRun
public interface Element
Base interface for all content elements. Uses Jackson's polymorphism mechanism based on the 'type' field in the JSON to instantiate the correct element class.

      void resolveStyles(StyleResolverContext context)
      Resolves styles for the given element using the provided style resolver context.
      Parameter:
      context - The style resolver context containing style map and default text style properties
